'Life Mastery' & 'Live Well' training, curriculum, and coaching certification... www.CenterForEmpowerment.com The Center for Empowerment (The Center) offers coaching, keynotes, training, webinars, live experiential events, and online courses that significantly improve the lives and performances of individuals, entrepreneurs, institutions, municipalities, and corporate workforces.The Center specializes in PERMANENTLY empowering others (from children, entrepreneurs, and corporate leaders, to prison inmates), to lead highly effective, fulfilling, and heroic lives.We empower, enlighten, and inspire 'heroes' to lead extraordinary, fulfilling, and successful lives of wellness, wellbeing, passion, purpose, balance, and joy. We achieve this while also helping them apply their newly realized powers toward 'creating a better world'.All curriculum utilizes the PermaLearn Mastery System, a unique and highly effective process for helping clients MASTER the 'skills, insights, and character traits' required for maximizing their potential, performance, and well-being. This curriculum can be customized to meet the exacting needs of virtually any client or purpose. One-on-one Coaching and Consulting by Master Coaching Strategist Mark Fournier, is also available to a select clientele.To learn more about The Center for Empowerment, and how we might support YOU with our empowering programs, courses and events, go to www.CenterForEmpowerment.com Please scroll down to find endorsements.
750 W. Lake Cook Rd Ste 375 Buffalo Grove, IL 60089

LIVING the 'Impossible Dream'...We help 'Achievers' THRIVE in every area of their life & career.   LIMITLESS is a life-defining, 'coaching & support process' created by Master Coach Mark Fournier.  LIMITLESS Helps you gain greater balance and fulfilment in your life and career, live and die without regrets, and leave a legacy. LIMITLESS helps you DO, GET, & BE... MORE of what you Want! And the more ambitious, the better, because 'impossible'... is just a 'word'.Simplify your life, save time & money, reduce stress, find greater purpose & passion, increase wellness, wellbeing & wealth.Outsource your Problems! Support your Dreams!​EVERYONE needs a coach! MOST 'self-made' achievers fall far short of their potential for personal & career fulfillment by trying to do too many things themselves. We can simplify your life & career, while optimizing your results. "​I've worked with Mark for over 35 years; he is a bonafide genius. Having Mark on your team is like having your own private think-tank, problem-solver, strategist, marketing guru, and personal guide!~Rita Davenport﻿, NSA Speaker-of-the-year, Best-Selling Author, TV Host, Past President-Arbonne Whether you want more 'success, income, influence, impact, passion, happiness, freedom, fulfilment, love, peace, ​balance, health & vitality', or a greater sense of direction, purpose, & significance, we can help. “Mark is the quintessential LIFE Planner & Coach for Professionals. Between his knowledge of the human psyche, and his insights into maximizing potential & performance, he is a priceless resource for anyone who wants to take their life or career to the next level.”  ~Dr. Mark Rosenbloom MD, Founder & Chief Medical Officer LIFEFORCE Medical Institute    Want to grow your business, empower your teams, help your family, ​reinvent yourself or your career, improve your marriage, master your health & fitness, gain tranquility, or change the world? ...Go to: www.CoachMarkFournier.com

"We DO GOOD by helping YOU do good!" ~Mark FournierDO GOOD Enterprises is a 501 (c)(3) nonprofit ‘Resource Center’ for individuals and organizations that wish to ‘DO GOOD’ in the world’. OUR mission is to help  established  and burgeoning NGO's, nonprofits, social entrepreneurs & enterprises, and ‘altruistic problem solvers’, pursue their passions, launch and sustain their missions, and create the world of their dreams... 'OUR mission is to help you achieve YOUR mission.'   CAUSE-DRIVEN ORGANIZATIONS: We help you achieve your goals by sharing our targeted resources with you in the following areas: Fundraising, Marketing & Branding, Community Awareness, Staff & Volunteer Training & Development, and Corporate Culture. SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURS: We provide you with the same resources as our NGO's. However, we also EMPOWER you to lead successful, fulfilling, passionate, purpose-driven, heroic lives, as social entrepreneurs and ‘professional heroes’, who consistently use their power to ‘DO GOOD’ and ‘create a better world’.DO GOOD specializes in the use of sustainable practices that consistently fund your goals, year in and year out. DO GOOD also offers scholarships to our comprehensive training & development courses and coaching (free of charge) to those who qualify.To learn more about DO GOOD Enterprises, and how we might assist YOU with our empowering resources, please visit www.DOGOODEnterprises.org

Mark Fournier is the ultimate Level 5 Leader. Author Jim Collins in his book, "Good to Great," clearly is describing the characteristics and core principles of Mark when describing the few and far between people known as Level 5 Leaders. Mark not only has skills, knows how to manage people and teams of people, but also posses that extra dimension of humility and will. Through the years Mark has demonstrated his will to win in his personal and business endeavors and challenges. I have always admired and respected the "underdogs" of life. I admire and respect Mark not just for all the success, awards and accomplishments, but for the challenges and sacrifices he made along the way. Mark daily demonstrates the desire and passion to help others, be a role model to others, a true selfless leader. Mark is a "winner."I consider it a privilege and honor to call Mark my coach, my partner and best of all, my friend.

December 14, 2012, Roni was a client of Mark’s

Mark was my empowerment coach when I was preparing for a solo walk across South Dakota. His coaching revved up my confidence, gave me skills I was still lacking and gave me internal conversation to successfully walk nearly 400 miles to raise awareness about the plight of the wild mustang. For many years I was a personal development coach myself. And I have trained with the best (including the well-known Anthony Robbins.) Mark had new insights and innovative techniques and tools that surprised even me! But the most important quality about Mark was his incredible approachability. He knows how to make a client feel at ease. And that is a critical quality in a coach!! I will always be grateful for the contribution he made to my challenging endeavor.

I first met Mark through my wife, DeeAnn, who took Mark's "Course of Action". It was during that course that I started noticing very likeable changes in my wife's interaction with others and myself.Ultimately I took the Course of Action myself, enjoyed every moment of it and noticed that I started to better understand people's behaviour.I always thought I could read people quite well, but it wasn't untill after I took the course that "the light went on".One aspect of the course in particular that hit home for me was the "Bright train, dark train" chapter.I would highly recommend for anyone to tap into Mark's vast knowledge of human behaviour, it will benefit you in ways you can't imagine.Finally, I am proud to count Mark as one of my most trusted friends.Michael LensenProLink Properties.

"What I have gotten from the talented and brilliant Mark Fournier is the ability to take the blind fold off of my eyes, and see, almost like it was the first time." This is a small part of one of my managers/consultants - testimony, thanking me for recommending Mark Fournier to her... like many others who "listened to me and my recommendations". I knew the benefits they will get, I experienced and benefited so much from the most incredible coach I have ever worked with. (I worked with several coaches over the years).Mark has been my personal coach since July 2007. since I met/worked with Mark - my life changed 180 degrees!!! it is beyond words... his brilliance, sensitivity, His abundance of giving, loving nature (many times he gave me what I needed TOUGH LOVE and.. it wasn't easy...) setting the boundaries, teaching and thinking outside the box, creative, with unconditionally and nonjudgmental love and respect.I became the person I am today, mostly because of the work we did together for over 3 years now. I participated in each and every program he provided. therefore... I couldn't keep my mouth closed... and recommended him to everyone I cared for and wanted for them to receive what I have received from him - DISCOVERING ADA... my inner strengths, the belief in myself, and the talents I was blessed with. It "showed up" big time! Mark is the most generous spirited mentor and friend - I could alwaystrust that he'll be there for me at any time of need. He also recognizedand appreciated who I am as a person,a business woman, and a partnerto success in all areas.it came to a point that we actually worked together on other programs, mastermind, course of action, brain storm, and the list is never ending...I could go on and on... if you want to know more... please contact meat ada@myarbonne.com - call me 310-310-3322. I will do and be readyat any time to answer any questions you want to know about Mark!Thank you my dearest precious coach and friend - MFF - from AFBZ...

It has been my pleasure to work very closely with Mark Fournier for 5 years.  I have represented Mark as a Keynote, coach, during coaching conference calls and on the radio many, many times and he never ceases to amaze me. He is delightful, insightful and bang-on every time.  His genius in developing and delivering cutting edge empowerment programs is by far the best I have ever seen.  Mark`s compassion and integrity are the base that he springs from.  Should you have the opportunity to be coached by him, or even take his Course of Action, you will be forever changed, and enlightened.  Mark Fournier is the best thing that ever happened to my marriage and my personal growth and I look forward to many more years of supporting and co-developing programs with him for the spa industry.

Dr. Mark Rosenbloom is not only brilliant; he deeply cares about my wellness. I've never been treated by a healthcare professional with a greater commitment to my overall wellbeing. He has tirelessly researched solutions to my many physical challenges (from Cancer, Rheumatoid Arthritis and a neuro-muscular disease, to partial paralysis, and autoimmune disease). And although I turn 60 next year, he not only has me living a full life without the use of prescription medications... I am still actively competing in multiple sports and running circles around my teenagers!

He has tirelessly researched solutions to my many physical challenges (from Cancer, Rheumatoid Arthritis and a neuro-muscular disease, to partial paralysis, and autoimmune disease). And although I turn 60 next year, he not only has me living a full life without the use of prescription medications... I am still actively competing in multiple sports and running circles around my teenagers!

summary: 40-Year, Veteran Curriculum Developer & Trainer, 3-time EMMY Award-Winning Filmmaker; Author; Keynote Speaker; Certified, Master Success Coach & LIFE Planner, Mark is also a  Reinvention, Branding and Marketing Strategist. Mark Fournier is a world leader in 'Permanent Transformation' and creator of the 'PermaLearn' mastery process, providing a quantum leap in personal development & performance. Mark helps his clients THRIVE in every area of their life & career through his various programs and courses, which are aimed at the individual needs of his clients, who range from C-suite executives, entrepreneurs, super-achievers, athletes, and corporate work forces, to children and families, as well as prison inmates, and other marginalized members of society.   "Mark is a GAME-CHANGING VISIONARY and Master Coach in Human Empowerment, & Performance." Rita Davenport, NSA Speaker-of-the-year, Best-Selling Author, TV Host, 25-year President Arbonne International"Mark helps clients (and their teams) lead extraordinary, meaningful, and fulfilling lives." Michael Lamonica, Director of Communications, Motorola  Mark is also the founder/provost of the 'Center for Empowerment', a personal & career development organization that provides the actual curriculum used in conjunction with the PermaLearn process.  He is the founder of 'DO GOOD enterprises', a 501(c)(3) nonprofit social enterprise that helps other causes reach their goals, while donating training to those in need. And when time allows, he creates large 'inspirational kinetic sculptures' that raise funds for nonprofits.Mark is also a thriving cancer survivor, a patented inventor, and a dedicated father.  "I am most deeply committed to individuals and organizations who wish to defy the odds, blaze new trails, and leave a profound and lasting impact on the world." ~Mark Fournier"Mark is the best coach and trainer in the industry!" ~DeeAnn Lensen, Winner, 'Trainer of the Year', Spa Magazine.
